job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: key qualificationsltbrgt babsbeng or higher degree with emphasis in electricalnetwork engineering computer science analytics statistics economics or equivalent degreeexperienceltbrgt years of experience in data mining amp analytics working with clients and knowledge of data and insightsltbrgt years experience in rf engineering network analytics or network planningltbrgt experience working with large datasets and an understanding of statistical analysis fluency in sql and scripting languages python preferredltbrgt knowledge of telecom infrastructure network principles coverage and capacity requirementsltbrgt experience working on network performance and analytics for an operator or equipment vendor deploying or operating telecom networksltbrgt strong interpersonal skills with experience of driving action based on datadriven insights ability to turn vague concepts and asks into welldocumented and effective business metrics and storytelling through data insightsltbrgt track record of operating independently demonstrating creativity being detailoriented and delivering results in a highly organized mannerltbrgt comfort working across time zones remote teams and cultures required
